Name: Floridita Margarita
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge & salt rim (optional).
Review: A blush coloured, Margarita-style drink with a well-matched amalgamation of flavours.
History: Created in 1999 by Robert Plotkin and Raymon Flores of BarMedia, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Floridita Margarita contains 213 calories
